```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(usethis)
library(devtools)

#  clean up usethis output
hook_message <- knitr::knit_hooks$get('message')
process_usethis_messages <- function(x, options) {
  x <- x %>% 
    str_remove_all("\n|##") %>% 
    str_trim() %>% 
    str_split("âœ” ") %>% 
    pluck(1) %>% 
    discard(~.x == "") %>% 
    paste0("## âœ” ", .) %>% 
    str_trunc(width = 100)
  
  hook_message(x, options)
}
knitr::knit_hooks$set(message = process_usethis_messages)
```
